Uncrustify: Where do the options work?

Spaces for class

{
   class my_class█:█baseclass1, baseclass2
{
public:
        my_class█(int b)█:█x(b);

        my_class█() : c(2)
        {
        }
}

Register

sp_after_class_colon Add or remove space after class ':'
sp_before_class_colon Add or remove space before class ':'
sp_after_constr_colon Add or remove space after class constructor ':'.
sp_before_constr_colon Add or remove space before class constructor ':'.
sp_func_class_paren Add or remove space between a constructor/destructor and the open paren.
sp_func_class_paren_empty Add or remove space between a constructor without parameters or destructor and '()'.
